useCase.name: Manage Feature Prioritization
useCase.description: Team Member manages the prioritization of features

preconditions.precondition: Team Member has access to the Feature Backlog

successEndConditions.condition: Feasibility and Design confirmation received for prioritized features

failureEndConditions.condition: Re-evaluation and update of feature priorities required

useCase.trigger: Team Member needs to prioritize features

mainSequence.step: Access Feature Backlog from CMS/Backlog database
Consult on Technical Feasibility with Engineer
Update Prioritized Features List in CMS
Share Prioritized Features List with Engineer
Share Prioritized Features List with Designer
Input Design Requirements to CMS by Designer
Update Technical Details in CMS by Engineer

asteps.step: Re-evaluate and Update Priorities if issues identified
